data.name: Usage
data.value:
Usage: TripperistaListExtractor --inputSavedListUrl <URL> [options]
Options: --inputSavedListUrl <URL> Required. Google Maps shared saved list link. --outputKmlFile <FILE> Optional. KML output file path. Defaults to sanitized list name. --outputCsvFile <FILE> Optional. CSV output file path. Defaults to sanitized list name. --googlePlacesApiKey <KEY> Optional. Google Places API key override. --headless [<true|false>] Optional. Controls Playwright headless mode. Defaults to true. --verbose | -v Optional. Enables verbose logging. --help | -h Shows this message.
